name: Grilled Citrus-Marinated Poussin
keywords: dry white wine, extra virgin olive oil, lemon, orange, poultry, poussins, main course
recipeIngredient: Salt and freshly ground black pepper

recipeInstructions.text: Combine orange, lemon, oregano and wine in food processor, and puree. Add orange juice and olive oil. Season with salt and pepper. Transfer to large bowl.
Place poussins in marinade, turning to coat well. Cover; refrigerate 3 to 4 hours.
Preheat grill. Grill poussins, turning once, until evenly browned and cooked through, about 45 minutes. Arrange on platter, garnish with lemon wedges and serve.
